    Classes in org.jscience.mathematics.sequences that implement InfiniteSequence
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    FibonacciSequence
    Represents the Fibonacci sequence: 0, 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, ... defined by F(0)=0, F(1)=1, F(n) = F(n-1) + F(n-2).
    class 
    GeometricSeries
    Represents a Geometric series: a + ar + ar^2 + ar^3 + ...
    class 
    HarmonicSeries
    Represents the Harmonic series: 1 + 1/2 + 1/3 + 1/4 + ...
